name: Rhythm Paper Scissors
description:
Rhythm Paper Scissors is a rhythm version of Rock Paper Scissors. The game generates a random pattern of rock paper or scissors for your opponent to signal to the rhythm, and your goal is to respond with the appropriate counters, also to the rhythm, using the arrow keys.

RPS was made in about a week for QaziJam8. Check out the rest of the submissions!

All music was used with credit to Kevin MacLeod of incompetech.com

There might be an easter egg if you press the G key while playing.
